00022                 function init()
00023                 {
00024                         $this->caches_page(array('index'));

00029                 function index()
00030                 {
00031                         global $db;
00032                         
00033                         if (isset($_GET['software_name']))
00034                         {
00035                                 $software_factory = new Software();
00036                                 $softwares = $software_factory->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`name` = '{$db->escape($_GET['software_name'])}' AND (`name` != 'guidatv' OR `type` = 'macosx')",
00037                                         'limit' => 1));
00038                                 if (count($softwares) > 0)
00039                                 {
00040                                         $this->software = $softwares[0];
00041                                         $this->software->has_many('software_releases');
00042                                         // Sort releases
00043                                         $releases = $this->software->software_releases;
00044                                         usort($releases, array($releases[0], 'sort_releases'));
00045                                         $this->software->release = $releases[0];
00046                                         $this->software->release->has_many('software_artifacts');
00047                                         
00048                                         // Horrible hack to enable per-software caching.
00049                                         $_REQUEST['id'] = $this->software->id;
00050                                 }
00051                         }
00052                         else if (isset($_GET['id']))
00053                         {
00054                                 $this->software = new Software();
00055                                 $this->software->find_by_id($_GET['id']);
00056                                 $this->software->has_many('software_releases');
00057                                 // Sort releases
00058                                 $releases = $this->software->software_releases;
00059 
00060                                 usort($releases, array($releases[0], 'sort_releases'));
00061                                 $this->software->release = $releases[0];
00062                                 $this->software->release->has_many('software_artifacts');
00063                         }
00064                         else
00065                         {
00066                                 $this->render_error();
00067                         }
00068                 }
00069         }
